name: FanTris
description:
FanTris = Fan Art + Tetris !!!
And the game chosen in this edition of FanTris was Miner Ultra Adventures, this game was created with the help of many fans around the world, using the strategy and intelligence, you need to destroy the haters to enjoy a fan art of the Miner Ultra Universe !!!

FEATURES

  • A big tribute to Miner fans.
  • Different types of art around the world.
  • Fans proud to see your drawings.
  • An interactive and different game.
  • Surrounding musics.
  • Increasing difficulty.
  • A new formula for an old acquaintance.
  • 15 levels for you to try to win the haters.
  • Where the classic meets the modern.
  • Guaranteed fun.
  • Great satisfaction when you break a part of the haters.
